name: Audio Dash
description:
Ride the waves of your music. Dash your way through the audio wave generated from the music itself while avoiding the edges. How far can you make it through?

Upload your favorite songs from your own library for even more fun! 

Feeling like a pro? Might I suggest Through the Fire and Flames by DragonForce for the ultimate challenge.

Accessibility Features:

  • Color-blind friendly
  • Mouse support
  • Keyboard support
  • Touch support
  • Adjustable game speed and music volume
  • Adjustable difficulty by raising or lowering the number of peaks
  • Casual mode

Support this game and others on Patreon
